## CallControlFactory.supportsCallControl() method

Verifies whether a device supports call control or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
supportsCallControl(potentialDevice: IDevice): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  potentialDevice | [IDevice](./jabra-js.idevice.md) | The device you wish to execute call control functionality on. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

true if we find ANY descriptor which matches call control functionality, false otherwise.
